meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or being an organic compound containing a carbon chain with one or more carbon-carbon double bonds.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the alkine compound in the lab.
meanings.sent2: The alkine structure of the molecule made it reactive.
meanings.sent3: The alkine reaction in the experiment fizzled out unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like an alkine river, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The alkine nature of the chemical reaction was evident under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A compound that contains a carbon-carbon double bond.
meanings.sent1: The alkine was used as a key component in the synthesis process.
meanings.sent2: She learned about the alkine in her chemistry class.
meanings.sent3: The alkine sat quietly on the shelf, waiting to be used.
meanings.sent4: His words carried an alkine of excitement as he talked about the compound.
meanings.sent5: The distinct smell of the alkine filled the room during the experiment.
